conditions.amount_of_each_solvent: 180 equivalents (to molybdenum catalyst 1a) of SmI2 and ethylene glycol
conditions.yield: 39.7 equivalents of ammonia based on the molybdenum atom (65% yield based on SmI2)
conditions.additional_information: Also produced 15.0 equivalents of hydrogen gas based on the molybdenum atom (16% yield based on SmI2)

materials.label: Reaction with larger amounts of SmI2 and ethylene glycol or water

conditions.amount_of_each_solvent: 14,400 equivalents (to catalyst 9) of SmI2 and ethylene glycol or water
conditions.yield: 3,650 equivalents of ammonia with ethylene glycol (76% yield based on SmI2) or 4,350 equivalents of ammonia with water (91% yield based on SmI2)

materials.label: Stoichiometric reaction of molybdenum complexes with SmI2

conditions.yield: Yields based on NMR spectroscopy: 76% (from 1a), 74% (from 1b), 85% (from 1c), and quantitative ammonia production from 4

materials.label: Catalytic reduction of dinitrogen to ammonia under 15N2

conditions.yield: 39.7 equivalents of ammonia based on the molybdenum atom (67% NMR yield based on SmI2)

materials.label: Catalytic reduction of dinitrogen to ammonia with water

conditions.yield: 26.8 equivalents of ammonia based on the molybdenum atom (43% yield based on SmI2)

materials.label: Catalytic reduction of hydrazine to ammonia

conditions.yield: 50.0 equivalents of ammonia based on the molybdenum atom (83% yield based on hydrazine)
